project.name: Orion Edge Gateway
project.scope: API gateway, rate limiting, auth integration

sections.title: Project Context & Security Requirements
sections.goal: Understand the PO's view on project scope, security baselines, and regulatory constraints for the gateway.
sample_questions: Can you outline the primary business drivers behind the Orion Edge Gateway build phase?
What are the baseline security requirements you have to meet from day one?
How do customer expectations influence your API gateway’s authentication and authorization design?

sections.title: Integration Points & Risk Surfaces
sections.goal: Explore how the gateway integrates with other systems and where potential vulnerabilities might emerge.
sample_questions: Which internal and external systems will Orion integrate with during initial rollout?
How do you plan to mitigate risks from third-party API consumers?
What are the failure modes you anticipate when mTLS handshake bugs occur, referencing GW-4821?

sections.title: Policy Alignment & Governance
sections.goal: Assess how the project aligns with corporate security policies and governance models.
sample_questions: How does POL-SEC-001 'Least Privilege & JIT Access' translate into gateway role definitions?
What controls are in place to ensure compliance with SLA-ORI-02 for latency?
How do you balance evidence from security audits against delivery timelines?

sections.title: Operational Scenarios & Incident Response
sections.goal: Examine preparedness for security incidents and operational failures.
sample_questions: Walk me through how RB-GW-011 Rolling Deployments would work if a critical security patch needs to be deployed.
What’s your escalation path if a zero-day vulnerability is found in the gateway’s auth module?
How do you coordinate with the SRE and Security teams during incident triage?

sections.title: Tradeoffs, Decisions & Long-term Risks
sections.goal: Understand the rationale behind key architectural/security tradeoffs and their long-term implications.
sample_questions: What tradeoffs have you made between performance and security, and why?
Can you provide an example of a decision informed by both customer needs and security audit findings?
Looking at the next 12–18 months, what emerging risks do you foresee for the Orion Edge Gateway?
